Stubbs Public Walks, Newcastle-Under-Lyme Newcastle Rose and Horticultural Show. Prizes - 1st £13.9s. and cornet, 2nd £7.13s. and tenor horn, 3rd £3.14s, and trombone. 7 bands competed.
